meaningMnemonic: You have <kanji>every</kanji> and <kanji>year</kanji> to combine into <vocabulary>every year</vocabulary> (<vocabulary>yearly</vocabulary> works as well).
readingMnemonic: The reading for 毎 is what you'd expect. The reading for 年 is the kun'yomi reading, though. So, use your knowledge of the vocab 年 to help yourself to remember the reading for this word. You'll need to remember that the reading for this word is strange to get it into that brain of yours.
